name: The Blood Eclipse
description: The longest lunar eclipse in each century shall bear the stain of blood -- both in the sky and on the ground. Try to survive in this humans vs zombies multiplayer game!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1 Processor: Intel Core i7 - 4710HQ CPU @ 2.50GHz Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia GeForce GTX 860M (GTX 970 or above required for VR) DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 7 GB available space
